tiers.name: Basic
tiers.description: The Free tier is designed for casual investors and students who want to get a basic understanding of the market. It provides a simple, easy-to-use platform to track a small number of stocks and access fundamental data.
features: Basic Financial Data: Real-time stock quotes (with some delay), company profiles, key financial metrics (P/E ratio, market cap, dividend yield).
Simple Charting: Basic interactive charts with a limited selection of indicators (e.g., Moving Averages, RSI).
Watchlists: Create and manage a single watchlist with a limited number of stocks.
News & Headlines: Access to real-time news headlines from major financial outlets.
limitations: Limited Tools: Only basic charting tools and indicators.
Limited Customization: No custom screening or advanced filtering.
Ads: May include advertisements and upgrade prompts.
No Export: No ability to export data.
Limited Watchlists: Only one watchlist with a maximum of 10-15 stocks.
tiers.subtitle: Newbie Investors

tiers.name: Amateur
tiers.description: The Basic tier is for individual investors who are actively managing their own portfolios. It provides more in-depth data and a wider range of technical and fundamental analysis tools to help with informed decision-making.
features: Real-time Data: Access to real-time stock prices and intraday data.
Advanced Charting: A wider variety of chart types (e.g., candlestick, bar) and a more extensive library of technical indicators (e.g., MACD, Fibonacci Retracements, Bollinger Bands).
Fundamental Analysis: Access to detailed financial statements (balance sheets, income statements, cash flow statements) and financial ratios.
Basic Stock Screener: A powerful screener with a moderate number of filters (e.g., price, volume, P/E ratio, ROE, market cap).
Multiple Watchlists: Create and manage multiple watchlists.
Alerts: Set up basic price alerts.
limitations: Limited Historical Data: Access to historical data for a limited time period (e.g., 5-10 years).
No Advanced Tools: No backtesting capabilities or complex quantitative analysis tools.
No API Access: Data cannot be exported via API.
Customer Support: Standard customer support, typically via email.
tiers.subtitle: Medium Investors

tiers.name: Premium
tiers.description: The Premium tier is for serious, active traders and investors who need comprehensive data and advanced analytics to gain a competitive edge. It includes a full suite of professional-grade tools and features.
features: All Basic Tier Features, plus:
Extensive Historical Data: Access to a full history of stock data (e.g., 20+ years).
Advanced Screening: A highly customizable stock screener with hundreds of filters, including technical, fundamental, and custom fields.
Backtesting Engine: Test and optimize trading strategies on historical data.
Algorithmic Trading: Tools to create, test, and deploy automated trading strategies (paper trading only).
In-depth Research: Access to expert analysis, curated stock recommendations, and model portfolios.
News & Sentiment Analysis: Real-time news aggregation with sentiment analysis to gauge market mood.
Data Export: Export data to CSV or other formats for offline analysis.
Priority Support: Priority email and live chat support.
limitations: No Direct Trading: No direct brokerage integration for live trading.
Limited API Access: API access may be limited to a certain number of calls per day.
No Institutional Features: Does not include features designed for large-scale institutional use, such as multi-user collaboration or enterprise-level data feeds.
tiers.subtitle: Professional Investors

tiers.name: Institutional
tiers.description: The Institutional tier is an enterprise-level solution for financial professionals, hedge funds, and asset management firms. It provides comprehensive, highly scalable tools and data feeds for complex research and large-scale operations.
features: All Premium Tier Features, plus:
Full API Access: Unlimited API calls and enterprise-level data feeds.
Real-time Data Feeds: Direct, ultra-low-latency data feeds from all major exchanges.
Advanced Quantitative Analysis: Access to proprietary quantitative models and machine learning tools.
Multi-User & Collaboration: Tools for team collaboration, shared research, and user management.
Customization: The ability to build custom dashboards, reports, and integrate the platform into existing systems.
Dedicated Support: A dedicated account manager and 24/7 technical support.
limitations: Complexity: The platform is designed for professional users and requires technical expertise.
No Public Pricing: Pricing is not public and is based on custom quotes for each client.
tiers.subtitle: Institution Only
